None.Name: Power Flux
None.Description: Every 3 seconds, unit fires an elemental power sphere that deals 90 damage to enemies in a 5m radius around its target, up to 135 in total. Knocks back small units.

None.Name: Call Treespirit
None.Description: Activate to call for the assistance of Viridya's servant Treespirit. She will summon 1 Treespirit unit that is endowed with the natural power to slowly regenerate its ife points and has the same upgrade level as the unit itself. Only one Treespirit may be summoned at once. Reusable every 25 seconds.

None.Name: Viridya's Blessing
None.Description: Friendly units surrounding Viridya will regenerate 3% of their maximum life points every 2 seconds.

en.Description:
Lifepoints +25
Call Treespirit: +5 Regeneration per 2s for treespirits

de.Description:
Lifepoints +25
Call Treespirit: +5 Regeneration per 2s for treespirits

ru.Description:
Lifepoints +25
Call Treespirit: +5 Regeneration per 2s for treespirits

Extra.en: Information on the non-promo Viridya card states up to 3 treespirits can follow Viridya. This is false; there can only be one summoned treespirit at U0-U2,  and two at U3. Treespirits have no abilities other than 10 health regeneration per 2 seconds at U0,  15 at U2. Treespirits have 720 M Melee damage per 20s and 800 M health.

Treespirits have no abilities other than 10 health regeneration per 2 seconds at U0,  15 at U2. Treespirits have 720 M Melee damage per 20s and 800 M health.
